metadata.name: BITS Transfer Job Download From Direct IP
metadata.comment: Detects a BITS transfer job downloading file(s) from a direct IP address.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM network_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 16403 AND (contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://1')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://2')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://3')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://4')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://5')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://6')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://7')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://8')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://9')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://1')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://2')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://3')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://4')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://5')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://6')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://7')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://8')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://9'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://10.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://192.168.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.16.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.17.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.18.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.19.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.20.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.21.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.22.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.23.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.24.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.25.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.26.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.27.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.28.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.29.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.30.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://172.31.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://127.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('://169.254.')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('https://7-')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('http://7-'))))

output.summary: Detects a BITS transfer job downloading file(s) from a direct IP address.
